title: Nerd Week: Cynthia Frelund on projections models, belief in Browns, rookie expectations (Football 8/19)
description:
NFL Network Analytics Expert Cynthia Frelund joins Will Brinson for the continuation of 'Nerd Week'. Cynthia explains the methodology behind her projections (4:30) before exploring how they'll apply to different teams and players in 2020. How will the Browns perform this season (17:00)? What heights can the Cowboys offense reach (30:00)? Will and Cynthia dish out praise for Kyler Murray and the Cardinals, examine Le'Veon Bell's potential for a bounce back (44:15), set expectations for rookies and detail why the models are so high on the Saints (51:15).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @cfrelund
